blocks.text: Achieved a score of 0.79425 on Kaggle
1. Filled the 'na' values in Age and Fare columns with the mean of the respective columns.
2. Filled the 'na' values in Embarked column with the mode of the columns
3. Filled the 'na' values in Cabin column with " "
4. Added new Feature named 'Family', which is equal to number of siblings and parents
5. Added new feature named 'Title', which is title extracted from the name column
6. Replaced all the special titles like 'Dr','Rev','Col','Major' etc with 'others'
9. Extracted the Survived column as target variable column
10. Observed that age of passengers can be grouped into         5 categories(cannot be grouped in 6 categories because only 8 people fall in 6th category)
11. Found Similar observation in 'Fare' feature, grouped it into 4 categories.
12. Added a new feature named familysizegroup, which is alone when family feature equals 0, small when 0<family<4 and large when 4=<family
13. Added a new feature named ischildandrich, by default it's 0 , if age == 0 and pclass == 1 then it is 1 and if age ==0 and pclass == 2 then it is 1
15. Dropped the Cabin and Family column

16. Trained the model with randomforsetclassifier with following parameters --- n_estimators = 1000 , criterion = 'entropy' , max_depth = 5 , min_samples_leaf = 1, min_samples_split = 2 , max_features = 'auto' , bootstrap = False , oob_score = False, n_jobs = 1, random_seed = 42, verbose = 0
